body:
In this case, what module name should i use.
@wu-sheng

> it is safely to cast EnhancedInstance to the interface which i intercepted.

We just add a new interface, so it is safe to cast back to original interface or class.

> because of cast object, it it difficult to write unit test without create connect of external environment. (create actual object as parameter).

It isn't hard. EnhancedInstance is just an interface, you could inherit the old class and implement this interface, then you have the parameter. 

Also, take a look at recent PR, https://github.com/apache/skywalking/pull/3575. The plugin test is embedded. But interceptor unit tests are still required.(Instrument don't).
Tried approach with istio mixer applied 3 yaml files but can't see any data in skywalking-ui, will try ALS solution.

> In this case, what module name should i use.

You should be in same module, set `witness class` for existing instrumentation, and add a new one.
Check the istio mixer, I remember they say they will set it close by default someday, but am not sure when .
FYI @dmsolr
When #3584 is finished with me, I will modify to jvm-container
Can i make some log in plugin?

> Can i make some log in plugin?

Depends. The log is not a low payload to agent, network and storage.

We will expect you to move lower versions tests with these versions tests in this PR.

Take refs in 
- #3575, Compose test cases are supported soon
- #3584 
- Existing test cases on in https://github.com/SkyAPMTest/agent-auto-integration-testcases/tree/master/mongodb-3.x-scenario. Move this test into the PR and add your new versions.

Ping me on QQ or WeChat, this test is still experimental, so no full document, you may need helps directly.
refer to #3583

🐂🍺just need

params `connection`、`database`、`command` is easy to use 。
Trace receiver

Do we have two datasource-settings.properties files? I remember so. Only find one deleted, please confirm.

----
Verified, yes, there are two files. You seem to miss one.

> then please submit another PR to add the logo/icon for Ehcache.

@kezhenxu94 As a local span only, I think we don't need that.

> > then please submit another PR to add the logo/icon for Ehcache.
> 
> @kezhenxu94 As a local span only, I think we don't need that.

Ooops, I missed that, forgive me

Don't set test case to the method one by one. I know some books tell so, but I and many SkyWalking PMC  don't believe that clearly @kezhenxu94 thinks so too. We are doing white box tests for workflow.

> Is it possible to have a vision for each website easily?

I want to be clear. APM is monitoring backend system, so website is not our concern. If you set different backend services as different service names, then they are different. 

The path you mentioned is endpoint in skywalking concept, it is a subconcept under every specific service.

> Also, can we group several paths into one "general" path?

Grouping is agent's responsibility in agent case. In your case, should be .net agent's.
@wu-sheng @kezhenxu94 OK, I understand.

> The method names is not as what we discussed in [#3552 (comment)](https://github.com/apache/skywalking/pull/3552#discussion_r329522793)
> 
> I'm ok with this PR @wu-sheng , considering that @jsbxyyx you will contribute more test, please pay special attention to what we've discussed, :) thanks

Before, the conclusion is do not use `_` ?  style is it like this `methodNameDoesWhatWhenTheseConditions`?

> > The method names is not as what we discussed in [#3552 (comment)](https://github.com/apache/skywalking/pull/3552#discussion_r329522793)
> > I'm ok with this PR @wu-sheng , considering that @jsbxyyx you will contribute more test, please pay special attention to what we've discussed, :) thanks
> 
> Before, the conclusion is do not use `_` ? style is it like this `methodNameDoesWhatWhenTheseConditions`?

Not using `_` is mandatory, as for method names, I'm ok as long as it can tell the purpose of that test case, the most important point is as what @wu-sheng said above
Please open new PR to do the tests, thanks
thanks

The graphQL definition is like this
```graphql
type ServiceInstance {
    id: ID!
    name: String!
    attributes: [Attribute!]!
    language: Language!
}
```

We don't set es, you should.

This error may happen as a bug, fixed in master. But it would affect the bootstrap. So, if ports are not listening, there is another issue.

I am OK with PR, even it seems not necessary, at least, it is harmless either. 

@JaredTan95 As @kezhenxu94 left questions, please hold the merge before they are discussed.
We don't force the 2 approvers, because I want the flexible and trust all committers.

Congrats. It passed in 35mins, and cost per VM 30% CPU. Make sense to me. And we could add more to group1(Group2 is already 30min, longest path). Due to its timeout last time, please make timeout to 60s for each case.

Also, let's add multiple node parallel for compose case, to make the test framework structure completed.
#3584 merged, you are good to go.
Check #3590. The number of each test case is required now. We haven't documented yet, sorry.
FYI @dmsolr

First don't add into group2, Jetty tests cost the longest time. Don't make our test slower :P

Then your own test case failure.

> Basically, this PR LGTM. @kezhenxu94 What do you think?
> 
> I expect a new e2e test case added to test MySQL storage, but before doing that, I hope you could separate our e2e into 2 groups rather than 4, even 5(if MySQL added), which cost unpredictable CPU in CI env. Agree?

 Is #3583 the same one with what your mentioned?
@wu-sheng @kezhenxu94 @zhaoyuguang @ascrutae  please review

> Is #3583 the same one with what your mentioned?

That is only plugin test. I mean e2e test, check `test/e2e` folder and this doc
https://github.com/apache/skywalking/blob/master/docs/en/guides/README.md#end-to-end-tests-e2e-for-short
I will wait for the unit test for the new properties field, then I think the MySQL e2e could start in another PR.

> I'm slightly refactor the e2e running script in my ES7 adaptation PR, as what you expect (2 groups)

Sure. Look forward to your new PR about this feature. I think the community will like this.

already merge ehcache 2.x PR.
close it.
I will immigrate spring scenario #3620 and spring async scenario #3611

@dmsolr The old repo is read-only since today. We will encourage all test cases moving into here by following your framework and review.

Could you rebase your commit logs? There are Chinese comments and many old logs.
@tristaZero If you like to try agent contribution, this is a good one.
e2e fails
@tristaZero New e2e with MySQL should add to group1 of e2e.
I think this has been provided, AFAIK. Because the demo page has included this already.
Add to Group2.
SkyWalking is just opening grpc endpoint to your agent. We don't require any special thing. No matter what you are using, make sure gRPC/HTTP2 is connectable.

> Move this test into the PR and add your new versions.

The new suggestion is, move the old existing tests in a separated PR, and after it is merged, we continue to work on this one.

I don't know what does the error means. If you have issues about arthas, I think you should ask them.

From my understanding, arthas is designed for process monitoring or debug, it is not for tracing. SkyWalking is designed for the production env monitoring APM system. They are different.
FYI @dmsolr
Configures it in the Jenkins file later

> First don't add into group2, Jetty tests cost the longest time. Don't make our test slower :P
> 
> Then your own test case failure.

OK，already move to Group1

> This is just for Spring async test, right? I didn't find Spring annotation bean and mvc tests.

Yes，I will provide Spring annotation beans and MVC tests in another PR.
@dmsolr  seems we need workload2 and group3 for compose, group4 for new jvm cases
Can't find compose case run in this pr, and it didn't show failure. Anything wrong?

It is recommended to use UI components, which can save contributors a lot of time.
https://element.eleme.cn/#/en-US/component/table#table-with-border
The e2e codes are almost the same and can be refactor to reuse the ES6 tests, which will be refactored later in another PR, if I can got some time :)
Apply TBD until it's fully discussed and documentations are supplemented

> I want to know whether anyone from community will try this locally and in their test env. This looks very challenge for further maintain works, rather than this tests.
> 
> This must be based on near 100% test coverage(logically) supports, including e2e, IT tests, unit tests. We don't know when it breaks. And very hard to review.

Seems it's unwise to do ES7 adaptation along with ES6 together, closing for now
Hi @mrproliu , you push an unexpected directory (/dist).

> Hi @mrproliu , you push an unexpected directory (/dist).

I'm fix on it. I try to use git rebase command, but it unfamiliar to me. sorry about that.

found a potential reason.
https://github.com/apache/skywalking/blob/06c357da6cf4b919afa7534fa6d9f5404d1d3dbe/oap-server/server-core/src/main/java/org/apache/skywalking/oap/server/core/remote/RemoteSenderService.java#L56
`clientList` may be cleared by 
https://github.com/apache/skywalking/blob/06c357da6cf4b919afa7534fa6d9f5404d1d3dbe/oap-server/server-core/src/main/java/org/apache/skywalking/oap/server/core/remote/client/RemoteClientManager.java#L223 

When `RemoteSenderService` gets `clientList` which may refer to `clientA`. Before clientList is accessed, clientA may be replaced by clientB and cleared by `RemoteClientManager`.

Dose this make any sense? @wu-sheng @peng-yongsheng

> Let’s wait @kezhenxu94 setup 3 tasks to replace parallel across vm.

Set up, Jenkinsfile name `Jenkinsfile-Agent-Test-2`
Add postgresql plugin agent sql pararm show

can open it ?

> BTW, the submodule UI update should not be committed in one pull request.

why? don't understand this ?
@kezhenxu94 Confirm and merge, please.
Merge first, to make other PR continue. @kezhenxu94 any fix could go with a new pr.
@JaredTan95  I do not change submodule UI, its auto change the file time, how to repair this ?
Are you talking about monitoring oap cluster? We have document about self observability.
FYI, @zhaoyuguang

> LGTM. How to indicate to add only one/serveral specific optional or bootstrap plugins?

Not support yet. I wonder if this is necessary.

Actually, only that make sense. Even more than this one. Think in this way, more and more optional plugins added, one day a new optional contributed, all codes are good. But will add one span to many other cases. Then what do you expect?

If you don't know how to reset submodule to current, you have to recreate the branch from upstream master.

Also, as you are changing postgre plugin, we request you to submit another pr to move existing postgre plugin test into current one before we merge this. Like #3603 .

Than, you need to add this feature to plugin test case.(That is why I asked you you to do this)
Submodule is changed by yourself, there should be your local merge issue.
